name: courtier
description: Courtiers are skilled in the diplomatic arts. As a member of this esteemed profession you can dine with kings, chat pleasantly with Cardinals or, when required, pill state secrets from your own lovers' lips.

name: performer
description: Performers often earn their living by making crowds of people laugh, cry, and cheer. Whatever comes back when they pass the hat is often all they have to eat with that night. Because the take is so small (or maybe just because they can), some performers turn their talents to other (less honest) purposes.

name: dirty fighting
description: The niceties of pugilism are not for everyone. Some folks think that fair play is a good way to get killed.

name: fencing
description: Heroes trained in Fencing have a basic understanding of the theories and techniques of modern swordplay. This skill trains the Hero in the use of fencing weaponse such as the rapier, foil, smallsword and epee. It is the foundation for most of the training presented in Theah's Swordsman Schools.
